name: app-screenshots-batch-generate
description: This is a new project built for the purpose of providing a quick method to generate images for the different sizes and orientations for major app platforms. The original version will run primarily as a web app using Javascript. Currently creating npm version which can be added to anyones build scripts.

scripts.awesome-npm: npm run say-hello && echo 'echo NPM is awesome!'

author: Gavin James Boyd
